short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use, type 'ltng' plus the name or keyword of a Lightning Component

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Salesforce developers to look up Lightning components, interfaces and events by name and then be directly linked to the relevant page in the Lightning Component Library.  Fast and easy way to find reference material related to the Lightning Component Framework.
